title: Annual vs. Monthly Subscriptions: When to Pay Upfront
excerpt: Learn when paying annually saves money and when monthly payments make more sense.
editorial_summary: This article explains when to choose annual vs. monthly subscription payments. It covers how to calculate savings from annual plans, when monthly payments are better for cash flow, and how to evaluate if you'll actually use a service for a full year. Includes a calculator to compare annual vs. monthly costs.
